articles.title: Exclusive: Cowboys will face Browns in Week 1 to mark Tom Brady's FOX Sports debut - FOX Sports
articles.description: The Cowboys' Sept. 8 matchup vs. the Browns on FOX will be the first America's Game of the Week of 2024 — and mark Tom Brady's debut as FOX Sports' lead NFL analyst.
articles.content:
The Dallas Cowboys will head to Cleveland to face the Browns on Week 1 to kick off their 2024 season and Tom Brady's tenure as FOX Sports' lead NFL analyst. 
The Sunday, Sep. 8 matchup will be featu… [+1828 chars]
